item.description: The Summit View Meetinghouse and Banquet Facility provides for a quaint and charming gathering spot along rte. 5 across the Connceticut River. On Friday evenings the Summit View holds free outdoor concerts at their Pavilion. From 5:30 to 8:30p.m. a BBQ buffet is provided. All food and drinks must be purchased on the premises. Concerts begin at 6:30p.m. Brass Attack, Southern New England's finest live dance band, is a nine piece band, featuring four horns, a rythm section, and a lead vocalist performing the hits of artists: Tower of Power, Chicago, Frank Sinatra, James Brown, Glenn Miller, Van Morrison, Blood Sweat & Tears, and classic hits from the 1930's to the 1990's. This is sure to be another cool summer night!!! Suzie(Smiley) will be our hostess with the mostest for this event.
item.how_to_find_us: Two tables will be reserved for Single Mingle
item.name: Free Outoor Concert: Brass Attack
